diff --git a/ai/tasks/order.json b/ai/tasks/order.json index 874a279..540daba 100644 --- a/ai/tasks/order.json +++ b/ai/tasks/order.json @@ -1,6 +1,7 @@ [ - "TASK_007_ndjson_diff_logging", "TASK_008_milestone_container", + "TASK_007_ndjson_diff_logging", + "TASK_010_prompt_workspace_refactor", "TASK_009_task_board_reorder", "TASK_001_requirements_architecture", "TASK_002_schema_contract_baseline", diff --git a/docs/feature_workflow.md b/docs/feature_workflow.md index 3d8478c..54b3b0d 100644 --- a/docs/feature_workflow.md +++ b/docs/feature_workflow.md @@ -46,4 +46,13 @@ - `/api/prompts/generate`: general blueprint renderer (used by Prompt Editor UI + CLI). - `/api/contracts/prompts`: persists the current prompt template after preview/generation. +## 6. Prompt Workspace (Right Column) +- The right column now exposes four deterministic actions that open the middle-column prompt canvas: + - **Continue Development** – show/edit the rules-heavy restart prompt; copy or save local tweaks before dispatching to your agent. + - **New Feature / Module** – edit the base template, outline the feature in the details box, then click *Generate Prompt* to merge the two; copy the output directly or iterate before saving the template. + - **QA Pass** – similar to the feature flow but scoped to validation work; provide modules/areas in the scope box and generate a QA/UAT prompt. + - **Prompt Template (Master)** – edit the canonical prompt JSON the other actions clone, then save it via `/api/contracts/prompts`. +- Selecting any action replaces the monitoring view with the prompt canvas. Use **Back to Monitoring** to return to the task detail panel without losing state. +- Template edits for Continue/Feature/QA are stored locally (per operator) so you can iterate without touching backend files until ready. + Following this workflow ensures every feature request flows through a repeatable feasibility assessment, captures a structured plan, and keeps local/remote monitors in sync with the contract. diff --git a/src/ui/src/components/ContractEditor.tsx b/src/ui/src/components/ContractEditor.tsx index 737ae13..f5bb6c6 100644 --- a/src/ui/src/components/ContractEditor.tsx +++ b/src/ui/src/components/ContractEditor.tsx @@ -1,23 +1,3 @@ -import { useContractEditor } from '../hooks/useContractEditor' - -function ContractEditor() { - const { content, setContent, save, isSaving, error } = useContractEditor() - - return ( -
-

Contract Editor

-

details: Documented current task flows across TaskBoard/useTasks/taskStore before adding milestones.
Defined milestone data model, schemas, and seeded MILESTONE_001 artifacts including QA checklist/log scaffolding.
Drafted milestone workflow doc outlining lifecycle, QA gate, and validation/logging expectations.
Implemented milestone backend store, REST routes, and surfaced milestone_id on task summaries.
Added MilestoneBoard/useMilestones plus TaskBoard completed section so milestones + QA states render in the sidebar.
Created MVP milestone covering every task and seeded QA artifacts.
Wired milestone auto-progress so checklist completion flips milestones to QA pending with server tests.
npm run test failed (esbuild spawn EPERM) while running run-all-tests.ts; cannot execute tsx transform in current environment.
Rebuilt milestone index so MVP is the sole milestone, ensuring UI renders it first.
Simplified milestone/completed UI to minimal headers with toggles and divider lines.
Restored task-card layout inside milestones so items match the main board and are ready for drag interactions.
Removed unassigned duplication and wired milestone cards to reuse draggable task cards for cross-milestone moves.
Removed standalone Completed section so milestones are the single source of cards; main list now shows all tasks including finished ones.
Sidebar now hides the general task list when milestones exist and filters milestone cards to avoid duplicates.
Updated TASK_008 checklist with milestone creation + drag requirements per new UI direction.
